snippet: A federal judge in Baton Rouge has overturned the conviction of Herman Wallace, 71, held for 41 years in solitary confinement at the penitentiary at Angola and another prison.
abstract: Chief Judge Brian Jackson of Federal District Court in Baton Rouge, La, overturns 1974 murder conviction of Herman Wallace, held 41 years in solitary confinement, ordering new trial and immediate release.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Baton Rouge has overturned the conviction of Herman Wallace, 71, held for 41 years in solitary confinement at the penitentiary at Angola and another prison.

headline.main: Louisiana: New Trial for Man Convicted of Murder in '74
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: New Trial For Man Convicted In 1974
